text: Baroi hec insone sazovor nest, ki Alloh ʙa u kitoʙ va hukm va pajomʙari dihad, sipas ʙa mardum ʙigujad: "Ba coi Alloh ʙandagoni man ʙosed", ʙalki sazovori pajomʙaron in ast, ki ʙigujand: "Ba saʙaʙi on ci ta'lim medoded va dars mexonded, ʙandagoni Alloh ʙosed". (Modome, ki in iʙodat kardan ʙa pajomʙar loiq naʙosad, pas ʙa hec mardum ʙa tariqi avlo soista nest)
